Nice restaurant in a Plaza.  If you are going for dinner, be sure to be there at 7pm, because there will be a line for the wait.  It's worth the experience!! We were seated in the second floor which had a nice view into the Plaza.Tried out the Black Rice with Cuttlefish & Pasta that were very good!!  We also tried a rice with octupus black ink.  Service is impeccable, ambience and decoration is very chic!
